author: EXM7777
text:
i'm looking for 3 people that are passionate about AI to work with...

i'll set you up for success with a crazy good opportunity

shoot me a dm if you're talented with AI: prompting, vibe coding, ads, automation, anything AI...

this is the type of sh*t that can get you up to $10k/mo faster than you can imagine

just send a dm showing me your expertise, not your motivation
